data.message:
If you all just stop and think...he went idle for a while had to make himself relevant again!
 no new records just diss records.
 used to be an idol
But now he's just pain-relieving for bitches just like Midol.
 what happened to I don't do black music I don't do white music I do fight music for high school kids. Instead of this, he does a diss, our president that has nothing but one wish to make America great again! and what's Eminem do fills it with hate again! fuck you I put you I put one on your chin. He wants to be black but he just looks so white again.  So for that I say you lost one more fan today I don't know what your plan is today but you should stick with wrapping with Obi and Trey and get off the fucking politics hypocrite. Better yet why don't you and your 5 crew go stand out in the streets and see who runs over you
